call_title: Sigmanauts Mining Pool: Mine Any Token | qx() and Marc the Shark | ErgoHack VIII

topics.title: Sigmanauts Mining Pool Introduction and Formation
topics.summary: qx() and Marc the Shark introduce themselves and explain how they joined forces to create the Sigmanauts mining pool. They discuss the educational goals of the pool and the challenges of running a community-based mining operation.

topics.title: Mining Pool Infrastructure and Bot Features
topics.summary: Overview of the Sigmanauts pool's technical infrastructure including monitoring bots, notification systems, and bonus payment features. The pool includes automated reporting every six hours and random hourly bonus payments to miners.

topics.title: NFT-Based Pool Configuration Concept
topics.summary: Marc explains the innovative concept of using NFTs to drive permissionless mining pool configurations. This includes setting minimum payouts, UI backgrounds, and token swap preferences without requiring centralized web server modifications.

topics.title: ErgoHack Project Implementation Strategy
topics.summary: qx() describes the pivot from smart contracts to a layered approach for the ErgoHack submission due to time constraints. They demonstrate how miners can specify token preferences and payout addresses through rig name parameters.

topics.title: Data Architecture and API System Design
topics.summary: Technical deep-dive into the mirrored server architecture that extracts data from MiningCore without modifications. The system uses APIs to push data between servers and parse miner preferences into separate database columns.

topics.title: PPLNS Calculation Visual Explanation
topics.summary: Marc provides a detailed visual explanation of Pay Per Last N Shares (PPLNS) calculation methodology. He demonstrates how mining rewards are distributed based on share difficulty within a sliding window system.

topics.title: Token Swap Reward Distribution System
topics.summary: Explanation of how PPLNS calculations are applied specifically to miners requesting token swaps like Rosen BTC. The system calculates proportional rewards for swap participants and handles automatic ERG to token conversions.

topics.title: Advanced Trading and DeFi Integration Plans
topics.summary: Discussion of future features including grid bot trading, DuckPools integration for automatic yield farming, and strategic token purchasing to optimize miner rewards through market timing.

topics.title: NFT Dashboard Demo and Minting Process
topics.summary: Live demonstration of the NFT-based configuration system including the dashboard interface and minting process. The NFT stores miner preferences like ERG/token ratios and minimum payouts, with wallet verification for security.

topics.title: Future Architecture and Smart Contract Plans
topics.summary: Overview of the transition plan to full NFT-based payments and eventual smart contract implementation. Discussion includes hash rate rental concepts and the team's learning experience with Fleet SDK during ErgoHack.
